forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West northwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this evening, the sun bathes the cityscape in a warm embrace, kissing the familiar hills and the iconic bridges with golden light. With conditions settling into partly cloudy skies, the day is unfurling with a comfortable breeze that dances through the streets, while temperatures gracefully decline from the daytime high, inviting the crisp evening air. Patchy clouds drift lazily in the sky, yet visibility remains largely unobstructed, offering glimpses of the bay's shimmering waters and the distant mountains. 

Dressing in layers is advised, as the temperatures will soon drop to around 52. Light sweaters or jackets will be suitable companions as one strolls along the waterfront, perhaps grabbing a warm drink to enjoy against the backdrop of the sparkling city lights. As the hour grows late, the tranquility of this autumn evening beckons quiet walks or casual meet-ups in cozy outdoor cafés, embracing the fading light and the gentle rhythm of the waves. An evening spent wandering through the neighborhoods, soaking in the charm of San Francisco, promises to be nothing short of delightful.
